code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import dayjs from'dayjs';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SchedulePanel(_ref){let{venueId,apiBase}=_ref;const[events,setEvents]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{async function load(){try{const res=await axios.get("".concat(apiBase,"/events/").concat(venueId));setEvents(res.data||[]);}catch(e){setEvents([{hall_id:'Hall No-5',title:'AI Summit',start_time:'2025-10-09T10:00:00'},{hall_id:'Hall No-3',title:'Robotics Demo',start_time:'2025-10-09T11:30:00'}]);}}load();},[venueId,apiBase]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"space-y-2",children:events.map((ev,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3 bg-white rounded-md shadow-sm flex justify-between items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"font-semibold",children:ev.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xs text-slate-400",children:ev.hall_id})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-xs text-slate-500",children:dayjs(ev.start_time).format('HH:mm')})]},i))});}
